section.name: FileInfo
section.p:
Obtains file information about a specific file and stores the information in Ant properties. The following properties will be set when this Ant task is invoked:
file.size
file.lastmodified

tr.td: Set the file that will be examined.
Print the file information to stdout

Prefix used for file information properties. If no value is specified a default of "file" will be used. For example, if a prefix of "file1" is specified, the Ant task will use the following property names:
file1.size
file1.lastmodified

Format pattern used for any date information such as the last modified date. Use the SimpleDateFormat pattern to specify date patterns. If no format pattern is specified the date will be returned in raw (long) numerical format representing the number of milliseconds since "the epoch" (January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT).
